comments: Professor Lee came in to teach our class in the middle of the semester because our original professor had some family issues going on. Professor Lindsey is an angel sent from heaven!!! She is the best instructor!! I struggle in math, but she teaches things so clearly and is very helpful and nice. I ended up getting a B+ on the final!!

comments: Dr. Lee is a true angel!! God knew exactly what He was doing when he created this amazing, kind-hearted woman. She\'s very thorough when she teaches, she encourages students to ask questions, and if needed - she makes herself available. Thank God that I do not have to take anymore Math classes but if I did - Dr. Lee would be my ONLY choice!!

tag_professor: Respected (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Mrs Lee was an awesome teacher. It had been over 20 yrs since I had been in a math class and basically remembered very little algebra. I took an 8 week class which was fast paced but worked well for me. When she goes over new material she gives plenty of examples and will ask the following day if anyone had problems. Highly recommend her!

tag_professor: Respected (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Math was never a strong point of mine and I have been out of school for quite awhile. Mrs. Lee was extremely patient and helpful with the whole class. My son was having problems converting fractions to decimals and for once, I actually could help him with this problem, thanks to Mrs. Lee! She made Math fun for me, which it had never been before!
